assessments.status_rationale: No evidence in today's news of the DXY closing at or above 106.00; deadline is still in the future (2025-09-20).
No reporting of the U.S. 10-year TIPS real yield level; outcome depends on future closes before 2025-09-30.
No data on ICE BofA US Corporate Index OAS; comparison targets 2025-09-30 versus 2025-08-26 and cannot be assessed yet.
Relative performance of IBKR vs. SPY is determined by future adjusted close prices through 2025-09-20; no conclusive update in the news.
Outcome relies on cumulative performance through 2025-09-30; today’s news does not establish WBA vs. SPY underperformance by ≥4 pp.
No AAA national average gasoline price cited; the comparison date is 2025-09-20 vs. 2025-08-26, so result is not yet knowable.
No reports of DHL Express, UPS, or FedEx issuing EU-to-U.S. surcharge/service-change notices tied to de minimis; deadline is 2025-09-15.
University of Michigan September preliminary reading has not been reported; comparison to August final awaits data before 2025-09-13.
